console_open_msg: Haha, you opened the console. Are you trying to discover my secrets?
copy_message: What did you copy? Remember to credit the source if you share it!
screenshot_message: Did you take a picture? Am I cute?
hidden_message: Captain's supplies are guaranteed, but captain's quests have zero drops.
load_rand_textures: I don't have any other outfits yet.
Do you like my new clothes?

t5-7: Good morning! The early bird catches the worm. Have a wonderful day ahead!
t7-11: Good morning! How's work going? Don't sit for too long, get up and move around!
t11-14: It's noon now, after working all morning, it's time for lunch!
t14-17: Afternoons can make you sleepy. Have you completed today's exercise goals?
t17-19: It's evening! The sunset outside is beautiful, nothing beats the charm of a sunset~
t19-21: Good evening, how was your day?
t21-23: It's so late already. Get some rest, good night~
t23-5: Are you a night owl? Staying up so late, will you be able to get up tomorrow?
default: Hi~ Come and play with me!

Ah! Get out of the way!
Ah! Go away!
So annoying! Take your hand away!
Hey! I'll bite you!

No, no! Not there!
Hahaha, go away, you're tickling me.
Don't think I don't know what you're thinking...

Don't think that disabling me will stop you from having other means of attack

I cannot understand the your behavior

Shameless you

It's New Year's Day! A new year has begun, and this year is {year}~
It's Valentine's Day again. Did you find someone special in {year}?~
Today is International Women's Day!
Today is Tree Planting Day. Let's protect the environment!

It's Children's Day! Happy times are always short, wouldn't it be nice if we could stay young forever...
